alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:24PM CST until January 12 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lowndes County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Dallas County in south central Alabama... Western Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 124 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Benton to near Yellow Bluff, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Coosada, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Benton, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Tyler, Woodcrest, Snowdoun, Lagoon Park, Hunter, Alabama State University, Dallas Lake, Logan and Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
